ygData.subject: Alter Ability Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I personally dont have this problem but i have run across a SK who s Guild Master doesnt offer any training in Alter. And no amount of casting Siphon Stregth
ygData.messageBody:
I personally dont have this problem but i have run across a SK who's
Guild Master doesnt offer any training in Alter. And no amount of
casting Siphon Stregth brings it up.
He is a level 10 SK, so he should be able to train in it.
I dont have all the details, as in Race and his area.
I was just wondering if anyone else has run into this?

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
